org.libav.audio

Class PlaybackMixer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.audio.PlaybackMixer

  • public class PlaybackMixer
extends Object
    Playback mixer. It is an audio stream player which allows you to play multiple audio streams via one data line.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

      • isFormatSupported

        public boolean isFormatSupported(AudioFormat af)
        Check whether the conversion between the given audio format and the mixer target audio format is supported.
        Parameters:
        af - an audio format
        Returns:
        true if the conversion is supported, false otherwise

        Add an audio stream to the mixer.
        Parameters:
        ais - an audio input stream
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion between the audio format of the given audio input stream and the target audio format is not supported
